title: School support centres
creator_credit: Corporate Relations Unit, Western Metro Region and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: Kevin Collins, Chief General Manager, Schools Division, describes the development and role of the School Support Centres and their aims and objectives in assisting the school community and teachers with a range of services and courses which will ultimately provide greater benefits to students. Features examples from a number of different School Support Centres.
